remarks: Value of the converse of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdcnvid2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdcnvid2.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcnvid2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdcnvid2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran M ) $.
mapdcnvid2 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( `' M ` X ) ) = X ) $.
